[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-lrucache](./harp-lrucache.md) &gt; [LRUCache](./harp-lrucache.lrucache.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./harp-lrucache.lrucache._constructor_.md)

## LRUCache.(constructor)

Creates a new instance of `LRUCache`<!-- -->.

The optional \[\[sizeFunction\]\] can be used to fine tune the memory consumption of all cached elements, thus \[\[cacheCapacity\]\] means then memory used (in MBs). Otherwise, if \[\[sizeFunction\]\] is not specified, the \[\[cacheCapacity\]\] accounts for the maximum number of elements stored.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(cacheCapacity: number, sizeFunction?: (v: Value) => number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cacheCapacity | number | Number used to configure the maximum cache size, may express number of entries or memory consumed in megabytes depending on \[\[sizeFunction\]\]. |
|  sizeFunction | (v: Value) =&gt; number | A function determining the size per element. |
